div.a: Why Sandy Has Meteorologists Scared In 4 Images

div.div: She's huge. She's strong and might get stronger. She's strange. And she's directing the might of her storm surge right at New York City.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ti5ajD&via=Digg&text=Why Sandy Has Meteorologists Scared In 4 Images

div.div: GETTING OUT IN FRONT OF THE STORY

div.a: Paul McCartney: Yoko Ono Did Not Break Up The Beatles

div.div: After 50 years, the singer tells David Frost that Brian Epstein's successor was to blame for rock'n'roll's most famous split.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VRVkNj&via=Digg&text=Paul McCartney: Yoko Ono Did Not Break Up The Beatles

div.a: Why Is Hurricane Sandy So Big?

div.div: By Monday night or Tuesday, winds and clouds from Hurricane Sandy could stretch across the eastern third of the United States, according to weather predictions from the National Hurricane Center.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PeGpsB&via=Digg&text=Why Is Hurricane Sandy So Big?

div.a: Frankenstorm Grocery Chaos: Hundreds Of Hipsters Forced To Wait In Line

div.div: The first wave of destruction hit the Park Slope Food Coop early this morning, leaving in its wake a Kafkaesque nightmare with 78% cacao chocolate bars.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U7Jyrv&via=Digg&text=Frankenstorm Grocery Chaos: Hundreds Of Hipsters Forced To Wait In Line

div.div: Zynga has pissed off the online group Anonymous, and it’s quite serious.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S2EOUS&via=Digg&text=Anonymous Releases Video Threatening Zynga

div.a: 5 Horror Movies So Gruesome, The Makers Were Investigated For Cruelty And Murder

div.div: Every now and then, an especially ingenious special effect—or an especially gullible audience—has prompted police and courts to get involved.

div.a: Ping-Pong Robot Can Analyze Players, Will Eventually Surpass Its Human Masters

div.div: In 2012, humanity is on the road to losing another game to the superior programming of a machine. That’s right, there’s a machine that’s better than you at ping-pong.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TN3q8z&via=Digg&text=Ping-Pong Robot Can Analyze Players, Will Eventually Surpass Its Human Masters

div.a: Can Anyone In Space Hear You Scream?

div.div: Now scientists with only extreme discovery in their locker of ambition have decided to learn, once and for all, whether a scream in outer space can awaken alien ears.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U7zte8&via=Digg&text=Can Anyone In Space Hear You Scream?

div.a: A Brief History Of The Teleprompter

div.div: How a makeshift show business memory aid became the centerpiece of modern political campaigning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OZvJxX&via=Digg&text=A Brief History Of The Teleprompter

div.div: SELF-INCRIMINATION - THERE'S AN APP FOR THAT

div.a: Burglar Uses iPhone As Flashlight, Accidentally Records Crime

div.div: Sometimes iPhones can be a little too useful, as a burglar discovers when he inadvertently creates the evidence of his own guilt.

div.a: Watch These Webcams As Hurricane Sandy Hits The U.S. East Coast

div.div: These webcams provide a good view of Hurricane Sandy’s arrival in New York City, on Long Island, and along the Jersey Shore.

div.a: Lapham's Antidote To The Age Of BuzzFeed

div.div: With his erudite Quarterly, the legendary Harper’s editor aims for an antidote to digital-age ignorance.

div.a: The New And Updated Games Of Windows 8

div.div: Over the past decade, games like Microsoft’s Solitaire, Minesweeper, and Mahjong may be the most widely played video games on any platform. Windows 8 is giving them a serious upgrade.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ShSmOR&via=Digg&text=The New And Updated Games Of Windows 8

div.a: 'Darth Vader And Son,' A Star Wars Childrens Book

div.div: "Darth Vader and Son" is a cute book created by cartoonist Jeffrey Brown that gives us a comic style glimpse of what life might have been like for Lord Vader if he had been a good father and raised his son Luke.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TGHTP3&via=Digg&text='Darth Vader And Son,' A Star Wars Childrens Book

div.div: The official history of Monopoly states that the board game was invented in 1933 by an unemployed steam-radiator repairman named Charles Darrow. The game’s true origins, however, go unmentioned in the official literature.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VEjhrw&via=Digg&text=The Antimonopolist History Of 'Monopoly'

div.a: When Is A Cyberattack An Act Of War?

div.div: Defense Secretary Leon Panetta in a speech, said, “If a crippling cyberattack were launched against our nation, the American people must be protected.” But what is “crippling”?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SiLaCe&via=Digg&text=When Is A Cyberattack An Act Of War?

div.div: OF COURSE IT'S MADE OUT OF ALUMINUM

div.a: Steve Jobs's Yacht Makes Its First Appearance

div.div: Steve Jobs's yacht is making what looks to be its first public appearance in the Dutch city of Aalsmeer, a bit more than one year after his death.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/To4q12&via=Digg&text=Steve Jobs's Yacht Makes Its First Appearance

div.div: Windows 8 is full of awesome features and handy shortcuts, but what you may not know is that it's got a lot of handy, lesser-known settings under the hood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ShaSXu&via=Digg&text=Top 10 Secret Features In Windows 8

div.a: Why Children Think They Are Invisible When They Cover Their Eyes

div.div: Researchers are looking for a scientific answer to explain why children think they actually disappear when they cover their eyes while playing peekaboo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y7EQ11&via=Digg&text=Why Children Think They Are Invisible When They Cover Their Eyes
